description.value: The accept operation assigns an e-prescription to a healthcare provider (pharmacy). The status of the referenced Task changes into 'in-progres'.

documentation.value: The secret parameter that lets users access the Task exclusively as the URL an Paramter ?ac.

Collection of resources to let a pharmacy process a ePrescriptionn containing 1. the updated Task (including a secret, that gives a pharmacy exclusive access to the Task) and 2. a base64Binary of the qualified signed ePrescription. The status of the Task changes into in-progres. The prescription server creates a random number and stores it in Task.identifier:Secret.
